## heat wave in German

德國是非常注重環保議題的國家，近年來因氣候變遷等因素，造成熱浪來襲。藉由德國空氣汙染的統計數據，比較歷年來哪個因素造成最多CO2，用視覺化圖表呈現。

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
CO2 <-read_excel("C:\\Users\\Erin\\OneDrive\\文件\\GitHub\\hw\\week 2.1\\CO2.xlsx")
L <-filter(CO2, grepl(pattern ="CO2", x = CO2$Luftemissionsart , fixed =TRUE))
o <-select(.data = L,CPA,"1996")
c <-ggplot(data = CO2)  +geom_point(aes(x = 1995,y = CPA))
theme_set(theme_bw())
#ggplot(data.frame(L), aes(x = 1995, y = CPA)) + geom_point() 
qplot(x=1995,                               
      y=CPA,                              
      data=L,                      
      geom="point",                         
      main = "CO2 in 1995",  
      xlab="1995",                          
      ylab="CPA",                    
      )

```
